solution_line_template: During each boat trip, there can be {people_per_trip} people onboard, so during {trips_per_day} boat trips, there can be {trips_per_day} * {people_per_trip} = <<{trips_per_day}*{people_per_trip}={people_per_day}>>{people_per_day} people in total.
During two days the boat can transport a total of {people_per_day} * {num_days} = <<{people_per_day}*{num_days}={total_people}>>{total_people} people.
